name: Cutielympics
description:
This is a little demake of the Decathlon or theTrack and Field game for Pokitto. Thought, there are only 3 sports and the graphics is "cuter" :-)

The sports included are: Javelin, Hurdled, and Long Jump.  You can also attend to a tournament where you have 3 tries of each sport. The best result is counted to the total points of the tournament.
